description: Turn paella into a rich soup brimming with fresh seafood, rice, tomato and roasted peppers. Make this paella soup recipe for a flavour-packed meal.
name: Spanish Paella Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g thick white boneless fish fillets, cut into 3cm pieces
250g microwavable white rice, microwaved to packet instructions

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil and butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion, celery, potato and garlic and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes. Add paprika and cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant.
Add stock, passata and roasted peppers and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 25 minutes or until celery softens.

Remove saucepan from heat. Using a stick blender, blend until smooth, then stir through cream. Return to medium heat. Bring to a simmer, then add rice and seafood. Cover and cook for 5 minutes or until seafood is cooked. Add celery salt and ground white pepper, then stir to combine.
Ladle soup into bowls, scatter over parsley, then serve with bread and lemon.
